SELECT
CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE('#varFechaInicio','DD/MM/YY')),'fmday') IN ('sunday','domingo') THEN
    (
      CASE WHEN (TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE('#varFechaInicio','DD/MM/YY'))-3,'dd/mm/yy') IN (SELECT TO_CHAR(DF_FECHA,'dd/mm/yy') 
      FROM CL_DIAS_FERIADOS WHERE SUBSTR(DF_YEAR,3,2)=SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE('#varFechaInicio','DD/MM/YY'))-3,'DD/MM/YY'),7,2)))
      THEN 
      (
        CASE WHEN (TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE('#varFechaInicio','DD/MM/YY'))-4,'dd/mm/yy') IN (SELECT TO_CHAR(DF_FECHA,'dd/mm/yy') 
        FROM CL_DIAS_FERIADOS WHERE SUBSTR(DF_YEAR,3,2)=SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE('#varFechaInicio','DD/MM/YY'))-4,'DD/MM/YY'),7,2)))
        THEN TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE('#varFechaInicio','DD/MM/YY'))-5,'DD/MM/YY')
        ELSE TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE('#varFechaInicio','DD/MM/YY'))-4,'DD/MM/YY')
        END
      )
      ELSE TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE('#varFechaInicio','DD/MM/YY'))-2,'DD/MM/YY')
      END
    )
    WHEN (TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE('#varFechaInicio','DD/MM/YY')),'dd/mm/yy') IN (SELECT TO_CHAR(DF_FECHA,'dd/mm/yy') 
      FROM CL_DIAS_FERIADOS WHERE SUBSTR(DF_YEAR,3,2)=SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE('#varFechaInicio','DD/MM/YY')),'DD/MM/YY'),7,2)))
      THEN 
      (
        CASE WHEN (TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE('#varFechaInicio','DD/MM/YY'))-1,'dd/mm/yy') IN (SELECT TO_CHAR(DF_FECHA,'dd/mm/yy') 
        FROM CL_DIAS_FERIADOS WHERE SUBSTR(DF_YEAR,3,2)=SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE('#varFechaInicio','DD/MM/YY'))-2,'DD/MM/YY'),7,2)))
        THEN TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE('#varFechaInicio','DD/MM/YY'))-3,'DD/MM/YY')
        ELSE TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE('#varFechaInicio','DD/MM/YY'))-1,'DD/MM/YY')
        END
      )
    ELSE TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE('#varFechaInicio','DD/MM/YY')),'DD/MM/YY')
END
FROM DUAL

		 WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'fmday') IN ('tuesday','martes') THEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-8,'DD/MM/YY')

		 WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'fmday') IN ('sunday','domingo') THEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-13,'DD/MM/YY')
	END
FROM DUAL

  (SELECT  sum(SALDO_ACTUAL) FROM ATER.CB_BACOM_FINAL WHERE ATER.CB_BACOM_FINAL.CUENTA IN ('11101') 
 AND  ATER.CB_BACOM_FINAL.DIA = 'LUNES') < 0  THEN

 AND  ATER.CB_BACOM_FINAL.DIA = 'LUNES') *(-1) ELSE

 AND  ATER.CB_BACOM_FINAL.DIA = 'LUNES')
